author: wrowe
msg: No code flow change, but gets rid of two compiler warning emits...
* no return() value from int main(...)

author: wrowe
msg: Always add the appropriate MAKEOPT variables calling child .mak files.
Fixes a typo detecting the make.exe tool from Borland.

author: rbb
msg: #undef strchr and strrchr when in maintainer mode.  This keeps us from
getting a lot of warnings on platforms that use macros for these functions.

author: trawick
msg: Fix error messages issued from MPMs which explain where to change
missing: the same minor changes for the 2nd BeOS MPM
